messages.title: FRESH START
messages.content: After the scandals of MP's second jobs and their expenses I believe it's time for a FRESH START and I know many of you do too.

messages.title: FULL-TIME MP
messages.content: You can also find out a bit more about me, what I do, and why I think we need a FULL-TIME MP.

issues.governance: After the scandals of MP's second jobs and their expenses I believe it's time for a FRESH START and I know many of you do too.

leaflet.personalStatement: I really want to meet as many of you as possible and talk to you about YOUR issues and concerns.

contactInformation.address: Printed by BAPS Publishing Ltd., 113 Atlantic Way, Westward Ho!, Devon, EX39 1JG. Published and promoted by John Farrand-Rogers on behalf of Adam Symons and the Liberal Democrats, 88 High Street, Bideford, Devon, EX39 2AN

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is an invitation to informal public meetings where constituents can discuss various issues, learn more about the candidate, and where he calls for a FRESH START for Torridge and West Devon. Specific policies, endorsements, contact details aside from a phone number and website, and quotes are not included in the leaflet.
